original_text: They had travelled only a short way from the city. Then Joseph said to his servant, ‘Go now and follow those men. When you find them, say to them, “My master was kind to you. So why have you done this bad thing against us?
korean_text: 그들이 성읍에서 나가 멀리 가기 전에 요셉이 청지기에게 이르되 일어나 그 사람들의 뒤를 따라 가서 그들에게 이르기를 너희가 어찌하여 선을 악으로 갚느냐

sentences.original_text: They had travelled only a short way from the city.
Then Joseph said to his servant,
Go now and follow those men.
My master was kind to you.
So why have you done this bad thing against us?
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 어째서 너희는 우리에게 이런 나쁜 일을 했는가?
